Hi, actual Finn here. Not even 99% of Finns want to go to the sauna weekly, much fewer have the chance. While I've seen offices with a sauna, they sure are not in the majority, and I'm not quite certain most homes do either as there are definitely many without them.

I also dunno where these people invented the 15min recommendation for spending in a sauna, as there is no such thing, and 185F is very cold for a sauna .. most people would not go to a sauna before it's 210F at least.
